@SeanMulroy1 @NiamhSB The right to protest shouldn’t affect ordinary, decent citizens who have faith and belief in a church that you (or I!) don’t happen to share.
@NiamhSB I’m the same. And don’t get me started on those who booked up tickets and plan to not go, out of protest. So mean-spirited! Religion is really important to some people.
I’ve noticed recently that there are many people giving out about the Pope and the church... and then posting thank-yous to everyone who came to their children’s Christening. 🤷🏽‍♀️
@Trevttrev Really?

Imagine eating Eggs Benedict while waiting on a blind date like 😂

A man just approached me while I eat my breakfast asking if I was Angelina. He looked visibly horrified at the thought of my being Angelina (which I’m hoping boils down to the fact I am visibly pregnant and not a total munter) Anyway, hope he finds Angelina and enjoys their date
@Susie_2Z @glenrules I can only imagine my response if my husband tried that 😂
@Susie_2Z @glenrules I think he was making a joke Susan. The kicking out of bed bit is what made me chuckle anyway!

The real issues du jour:
Do you wash your new underwear before wearing?

@WexfordSinfonia And we’ve gone very minimalist... haven’t done up a room, don’t plan to (will paint and decorate a room when they’re old enough to pick their own colours.) Have somewhere for him/her to sleep, and some clothes. Plan to breastfeed... that’s it!
@chunky66 I buy my knickers in packets. ‘Nuff said 😂 #cheap
@WexfordSinfonia That’s what I think! I’ll be doing enough washing when he/she is here 😂
@OneillDeirdre YES DEIRDRE! (Although I do make people take their shoes off in my house, forgive me!)
@SineadUsher Ok this is good! I’d be of the same opinion!
@chunky66 Tumble dryer, all the way 😂 (bed sheets and towels for the clothes line, but I’m not fussing with undies and socks when I can lash them into the dryer, no matter how hot it is outside!)
@laniamh I mean, they weren’t on someone’s crotch 🤷🏽‍♀️ (unless you got an open pack = no).
@Deirdre__K But... like, the baby’s stuff is brand new, in a pack. I still don’t know will I even wash them 😂
@TarteAuCitron1 This is reassuring!! I thought it was just me!
@CrossyTweets So, it’s not just me? I just never even considered it. New clothes = wear straight away. I might not even wash the baby’s new vests and babygros, tbh. They’re in a packet!

I did a quick poll in work and turns out, lots of people wash their smalls before wearing.
I am so conflicted. I can’t stop thinking about it.

It all began with an innocent remark about washing all the baby’s clothes before using them. (I wouldn’t have thought I needed to)
NOW, I’m told grown-up humans wash their undies straight out of the packet before wearing. I love the joy of crispy new knickers out of the pack 😕
@Guy_Sinnott Actual beauty 😍
@MRabbette Gorgeous 😍 She’s morphing into you!
I have told everyone about this book and anyone who has read it has agreed - it is BRILLIANT. I’ve also read Liz’s other 2 novels and they’re just as gripping. Brilliant! https://t.co/jqyO0uOEW6
@molltrot And that has inspired me 😂
@molltrot They normally have gloves at the pump don’t they? I use them when they do! All those gnarly hands on the pumps 😷
@RoryFitz9 @Sdr4Kyle Go Kyle! My niece had SDR in 2013 and you probably know her - @katiewishtowalk - wishing you the absolute best of luck 💪🏽
@CaitrionaCrotty @DecPierce Thanks Caitriona - getting close now, so so excited! (Waddling, breathless but really excited!) xx
@robbatts My bump will stick itself into anyone’s face at this stage 😂
@SBlaneyParslow It really is. I have a new walk. I don’t like it 😂
@A16_Hughes I hear ya! Walking is no fun... all that pressure 😳 All the best to you too, exciting times! Xx
@Kmaria77 Oooh so exciting!! Best of luck in the coming days, you’re almost there! Xx
Come on ye SuperCats! Massive luck to the Kilkenny Ladies today - our house is full of very excited supporters this morning! 😸😺😸
@puppy_twisted Yes! I like your wife ☺️
RT @joannec85: @sweetpmac Pretty sure I read before that pregnant women are not allowed to use them, which is infuriating. Cos god those la…
@joannec85 Trying to choose the lesser of 2 evils! Walking is no fun these days, but neither is being wedged into tight spaces!

@DecPierce I wouldn’t imagine anyone would have a go at me but I’d still feel a bit cheeky, if someone rocked up with a load of car seats and smallies! However... pretty soon it could be the difference between my actually being able to get out of the car or not 😂 6 weeks to go!

What’s the story with heavily pregnant women being able to park there? I couldn’t bring myself to do it yesterday... but what’s the rule, so I know? I never see any for pregnant women and spaces are getting tight and far away 🤰🏽 https://t.co/IYn9zekPHj
Career high, cannot count to 3 😑 https://t.co/ng6OVim2Nr

I’ll never understand people who comment “who cares?” under articles. You do! You just commented! And very often, whether you approve or not, it IS news! Imagine being so cocky in yourself that people can only enjoy what you enjoy 🤷🏽‍♀️

@bazfitz1982 @Teresab1977 No coz brackets first = 2. Then multiplication - 5 X 2 = 10. And finally: 60 % 10 = 6
And if I’m being completely honest, my husband had to explain it to me coz I got 24 too 😂
@bazfitz1982 @Teresab1977 It’s 6. Good aul BOMDAS. 🤓
